long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Recurring Emails is a completely *free*, privacy-centric Chrome extension, that allows you to send automatically repeating emails and reminders using your email address, via SMTP. No tracking, no ads, no banners and no bloatware. Works with all email providers, including

- Apple iCloud Mail
- Gmail (for Gmail use https://recurring-emails-for-gmail.com)
- Yahoo! Mail
- Outlook
- AOL
+ many more
